name: Broccoli Stem Pickle
recipeIngredient: 2 clove of garlic, peeled and minced

recipeInstructions.text: Using a sharp knife, peel away the fibrous skin of the broccoli and then cut the pale inside trunk into matchstick-size batons. Blanch for one minute in boiling water, drain and cool under cold running water.
Whisk together the remaining ingredients, pour over the broccoli stems in a large bowl, toss and chill. Refrigerate for two hours before serving.
